item.title: Laura add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Confidence is going after Moby Dick in a rowboat and taking the tartar sauce with you." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Laura add a quote by Max Lucado
item.description: "What you and I might rate as an absolute disaster, God may rate as a pimple-level problem that will pass. He views your life the way you view a movie after you've read the book. When something bad happens, you feel the air sucked out of the theater. Everyone else gasps at the crisis on the screen. Not you. Why? You've read the book. You know how the good guy gets out of the tight spot. God views your life with the same confidence. He's not only read your story...he wrote it. " -- Max Lucado

item.title: Laura add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Laura add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "We don't stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing." -- George Bernard Shaw
